title: 怎么在武器上加药水效果
txt_content: 怎么在武器上加药水效果

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
无法直接加，只能间接探测，然后给拿着指定武器的玩家药水效果
执行单次的指令/scoreboard objectives add a dummy
/scoreboard players add @a a 0

高频:
/scoreboard players set @a a 0
/scoreboard players set @a a 1 {SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:diamond_sword",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"XXXXXX",Lore:["666"]}}}}
/effect @a[score_a_min=1] 效果ID 秒数 等级

这条指令会给手里拿着一把名叫XXXXXX，描述为666的钻石剑的玩家某种药水效果
